propValue.title: 采煤机循环作业图
propValue.data:
{"flux": "
from(bucket: "HistoryStore")
  |> range(start: -8h, stop: now())
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Tag")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["TagName"] == "CMJ_CMJWZ")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =="_value")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time","TagName"])
  |> yield()
"}
